channel.title: Firewall on Prajwol Bikram Adhikari
channel.description: Recent content in Firewall on Prajwol Bikram Adhikari

item.title: Part 1: Reviving an Old Laptop with Debian & Docker
item.description: Kickstart your homelab by turning an old laptop into a secure server. This guide details the process of installing Debian, performing initial hardening, and setting up Docker and Docker Compose for a solid foundation.

item.title: How I Built My Own Ad-Blocking DNS Server in the Cloud (Updated AWS Edition!)
item.description: Enjoy a faster, ad-free internet everywhere. This 2025 guide details how to build a free, private DNS server with AdGuard Home on an AWS EC2 instance, complete with SSL encryption and automated renewal.
